comments.creator: pjdkrunkt@lycos.com
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.20) Gecko/20110803 Firefox/3.6.20
Build ID: 20110803131630

Steps to reproduce:

Created a clean new profile and started up Aurora (8.0a2).


Actual results:

Received a warning that "Another program on your computer would like to modify Aurora with the following add-on: Default 8.0a2"


Expected results:

The default theme should be ignored when checking for 3rd party add-ons.
comments.author: pjdkrunkt@lycos.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 555965
Install Add-on warning for default theme.

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.20) Gecko/20110803 Firefox/3.6.20
Build ID: 20110803131630

Steps to reproduce:

Created a clean new profile and started up Aurora (8.0a2).


Actual results:

Received a warning that "Another program on your computer would like to modify Aurora with the following add-on: Default 8.0a2"


Expected results:

The default theme should be ignored when checking for 3rd party add-ons.
